CHIStyleController - Class in com.example.softmethproject4
This class defines the Controller for the CHIStyleView and also defines all attributes and elements on the CHIStyleView, as well as the methods behind each ActionEvent that occurs on that view and connects to the backend program.

clearOrder() - Method in class com.example.softmethproject4.CurrentOrderController
This method clears the Order of pizzas from the current order when the user clicks the Clear Order button.
clearOrder() - Method in class com.example.softmethproject4.Order
This method is used to clear the current order and decrement the orderCounter variable so the serial numbers remain consistent when creating new orders.

This method defines the common operation of creating a BBQChicken flavored pizza in the NYPizza and ChicagoPizza classes.

Crust - Enum Class in com.example.softmethproject4
This enum class defines the six different Crusts that a pizza can have, determined based on what style and flavor of pizza is chosen by the user.

Customizable - Interface in com.example.softmethproject4
This interface defines the add() and remove() that will be used to add or remove toppings to pizzas as well as add or remove pizzas from an order.
